languages.text: {n}Механизм, верно служивший Инквизиции, не желает так просто расставаться со своими секретами, и на корпусе его один за другим загораются угрожающе алые светлячки.{/n}
{n}The mechanism, having served the Inquisition so faithfully, is loath to part with its secrets. One after another, menacing scarlet dots light up on its casing.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Механизм, верно служивший Инквизиции, не желает так просто расставаться со своими секретами, и на корпусе его один за другим загораются угрожающе алые светлячки.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The machine spirit resists your hacking attempts, but feebly and sleepily. Containment protocols have firmly bound its mind, leaving almost no room for any will to resist. However, the mechanism, after serving the Inquisition so long and so faithfully, is loth to part with its secrets. One after another, menacing scarlet dots light up on its frame.{/n}

{n}The machine spirit resists your hacking attempts, but feebly and sleepily. Containment protocols have firmly bound its mind, leaving almost no room for any will to resist. However, the mechanism, after serving the Inquisition so long and so faithfully, is loth to part with its secrets. One after another, menacing scarlet dots light up on its frame.{/n}
{n}The mechanism, having served the Inquisition so faithfully, is loath to part with its secrets. One after another, menacing scarlet dots light up on its casing.{/n}

{n}The machine spirit resists your hacking attempts, but feebly and sleepily — containment protocols have firmly bound its mind, leaving almost no room for any will to resist. However, the mechanism, having served the Inquisition so long and so faithfully, is loth to part with its secrets. One after another, menacing scarlet fireflies light up on its frame.{/n}
{n}The mechanism, having served the Inquisition so faithfully, is loath to part with its secrets. One after another, menacing scarlet dots light up on its casing.{/n}
{n}The mechanism, having served the Inquisition so faithfully, is loath to part with its secrets. One after another, menacing scarlet dots light up on its casing.{/n}
{n}The mechanism, having served the Inquisition so faithfully, is loath to part with its secrets. One after another, menacing scarlet dots light up on its casing.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El mecanismo, habiendo servido fielmente a la Inquisición, es reacio a revelar sus secretos. Uno tras otro, una serie de amenazadores puntos escarlatas se iluminan en su carcasa.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mechanism, having served the Inquisition so faithfully, is loath to part with its secrets. One after another, menacing scarlet dots light up on its casing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El mecanismo, habiendo servido fielmente a la Inquisición, es reacio a revelar sus secretos. Uno tras otro, una serie de amenazadores puntos escarlatas se iluminan en su carcasa.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le mécanisme a fidèlement servi l'Inquisition pendant si longtemps qu'il ne semble pas disposé à se défaire de ses secrets. L'une après l'autre, des points écarlates menaçants s'allument sur la structure.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mechanism, having served the Inquisition so faithfully, is loath to part with its secrets. One after another, menacing scarlet dots light up on its casing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le mécanisme a fidèlement servi l'Inquisition pendant si longtemps qu'il ne semble pas disposé à se défaire de ses secrets. L'une après l'autre, des points écarlates menaçants s'allument sur la structure.{/n}

languages.text: {n}異端審問庁に忠実に仕えてきたこの機械は、秘密を手放そうとしない。そのケーシングには、威嚇するように緋色の点が次々と点灯する。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mechanism, having served the Inquisition so faithfully, is loath to part with its secrets. One after another, menacing scarlet dots light up on its casing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}異端審問庁に忠実に仕えてきたこの機械は、秘密を手放そうとしない。そのケーシングには、威嚇するように緋色の点が次々と点灯する。{/n}

languages.text: {n}这台机器忠诚不渝地为审判庭服务，根本不肯透露它的秘密。外壳上的红灯一盏接一盏地亮了起来，充满了威胁的意味。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mechanism, having served the Inquisition so faithfully, is loath to part with its secrets. One after another, menacing scarlet dots light up on its casing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这台机器忠诚不渝地为审判庭服务，根本不肯透露它的秘密。外壳上的红灯一盏接一盏地亮了起来，充满了威胁的意味。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Mechanismus, der der Inquisition so treu gedient hat, gibt seine Geheimnisse nur ungern preis. Immer mehr bedrohliche rote Punkte leuchten auf seinem Gehäuse auf.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mechanism, having served the Inquisition so faithfully, is loath to part with its secrets. One after another, menacing scarlet dots light up on its casing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Maschinengeist widersetzt sich deinen Hacking-Versuchen, allerdings schwach und verschlafen, denn sein Verstand wurde durch Eindämmungsprotokolle gefesselt und ihm bleibt fast kein Platz, um sich zu wehren. Der Mechanismus, welcher der Inquisition so lang und so treu gedient hat, will seine Geheimnisse jedoch nur ungern preisgeben. Einer nach dem anderen leuchten bedrohliche rote Leuchtkäfer in der Maschine auf.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Engizisyon'a inançla hizmet eden mekanizma, barındırdığı sırları paylaşmak konusunda isteksiz. Kasasında birbiri ardına tehditkâr, kızıl noktalar yanıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mechanism, having served the Inquisition so faithfully, is loath to part with its secrets. One after another, menacing scarlet dots light up on its casing.{/n}
